service.api_description: Integration through API for registration and parcels tracking in Ukraine
service.help_description: You will always be able to contact our manager to quickly resolve the issue

questions.title: FAQ
questions.question_1: What is the cost of services?
questions.description_1:
Organization of one shipment delivery – 39 UAH.

Storage of the shipment at the ROZETKA store during the entire term of the shipment reserve is free of charge.

Returning of the shipment to the pick-up point (if the package is rejected) is free of charge.
questions.question_2: What are the terms of delivery to the ROZETKA store?
questions.description_2: Usually, the delivery time to the ROZETKA store is 5 days from the moment of receipt of the shipment. If the package is sent from Kyiv, the delivery time is 2-4 days.
questions.question_3: At what time can parcels be handed over to ROZETKA pick-up points?
questions.description_3: During the working hours of the selected pick-up point.
questions.question_4: Can the pick-up point refuse to accept the shipment?
questions.description_4: Yes, they can. During the reception of the shipment, its cargo and dimensional characteristics, packaging and marking are checked. If something doesn't meet the requirements, the shipment won't be accepted.
questions.question_5: How many days is the shipment kept at the ROZETKA store before it's returned?
questions.description_5:
In ROZETKA store – 10 days.

In ROZETKA store, who work under a franchise:

– 5 days if it's postpayment delivery;
- 16 days if the order was paid online.
The storage period is displayed in the package information.
questions.question_6: Can the buyer inspect the product at the ROZETKA store and refuse to receive it?
questions.description_6: Yes, the buyer can inspect the product before receiving it and refuse it. The seller pays for the delivery of the shipment, regardless of whether the buyer picks up the order or refuses it.
questions.question_7: When is the parcel returned to the sender?
questions.description_7: After the expiration of the storage period, or immediately after the client refuses the parcel at the ROZETKA store.
questions.question_8: If the buyer refused the product or didn't pick it up, how does the return process work?
questions.description_8: After the buyer refuses at the ROZETKA store or cancels the order, the package is automatically returned to the pick-up point from which the shipment was made.
questions.question_9: Can the seller inspect returned shipments at the pick-up point?
questions.description_9: Yes, you can inspect returned items at the pick-up points until you receive the item return register.
questions.question_10: How does payment for delivery services at ROZETKA stores work?
questions.description_10:
Payment for services is made according to the invoice sent to the seller in the «Vchasno» electronic document management service. The bill for payment comes together with the act of providing services on the 10th of each subsequent calendar month, i.e. for September – in October, for October – in November, etc.
Payment is accepted exclusively from the current account of the individual entrepreneur or the legal entity with which the contract for logistics services has been concluded.

list_password.list_2: Password must contain at least one capital letter;
list_password.list_3: Password must contain only Latin letters;
list_password.list_4: Password must contain at least one number or special characters from the list @$!%*?& ;
list_password.list_6: Password must not match blacklisted passwords (e.g., 12345q, 123456, qwerty1, 1q2w3e4r, etc.)

verified.title: Choose a connection option
verified.sub_title_2: I do not have a contract with ROZETKA
verified.has_selling_text: For ROZETKA Marketplace sellers, there is a simplified connection to the ROZETKA Delivery service. Enter the token from the seller's personal account
verified.token_info:
In order to receive a token, go to the ROZETKA Marketplace account in the 'Issuing in ROZETKA' section, the 'Settings' tab and copy the token.

If you do not have access to the account, please contact your manager.
